attributes.review: I was excited for this app so I would be able to keep track of his campaign’s, unfortunately all I got was the app asking for my mobile phone number, then showing me different hentai recommendations. Extremely disappointing :(
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: The app is confusing slow and biggish. It seems like people from 2005 designed this app. I have a better user experience on the McDonald’s app and Atleast that clown has something good to offer me. This app is a disgrace to the App Store and shouldn’t exist. ZERO STARS!!!! I love mr trump but this isn’t the app to use
attributes.title: Can I give zero stars?

attributes.review: What the absolute heck guys . I was expecting something more interesting from this App ! Especially because I am a huge supporter! The app is filled with flying monkeys pant less ! I can’t get the image out of my head hairy monkey butts everywhere ! 😡😡😡😡😡 hate this app ! If I could give zero stars I would !
attributes.title: Karen Steams

attributes.review: I logged into the apps and it said black lives matter I was like what all lives matter it was horrible it was talking about how ice was wrong and of course they aren’t build the wall duh and it was saying justice for gorge Floyd but what the cop was inocent he did nothing wrong
attributes.title: It was so glitchy and wrong

attributes.review: I opened up to this app and saw the mos disgusting and nauseating app I have EVER seen in my whole life with inappropriate content I was there like 👁👄👁I have deleted this app from my phone because it’s just no❤️and my phone will still be scarred for life but this app needs to be deleted IMMEDIATELY😚✌️
attributes.title: 🧚🏿✨𝓼𝓱𝓾𝓽 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝓯𝓾𝓬𝓴 𝓾𝓹✨🧚🏿

attributes.review: So this app keeps on insisting that I go back to my home country...China... I was adopted and had done many many many disgusting things. It no longer supports the World Health Organization app, it also seems to only link up to support big oil, and To be a racist. Do not install.
attributes.title: Horrible app.

attributes.review: I WISH I could give this app less than one star.. it really doesn’t deserve the star I’m giving it. I just wanted to warn everyone before they downloaded it that it’s the WORST app for news or for anything. This app shouldn’t have been created at all...
attributes.title: what is this...

attributes.review: I am a huge Trump supporter and had no idea that he actually had an app until now, so of course I wanted to download it immediately. After hours and hours of loading in the app I opened it with a smile on my face until.. A MINIATURE VERSION OF OUR 45th PRESIDENT DROP KICKED MY PHONE WHILE REPEATEDLY SCREAMING “ELBOW GREASE” I can’t believe this happened to me😔
attributes.title: Painfully painful app🗿🙏

attributes.review: This app drained all the battery from my phone after being downloaded and once i got my phone back on it had hacked into my personal data and stole so much information from me. it also promotes false ideas and a white supremacist with a fetish for cheetos🤮🤮🤮🤮⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app crashed so many times in the 5 secs i had it open. When it first opened it scared me half to death because a big ugly orange thing was looking at me. It was truly terrifying. Then I realized it was donald. It scared me even more. Probably wont be able to sleep at night now.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE
